bug.author: alexanderst
bug.description: 1.### **org.deeplearning4j.models.word2vec.Word2VecTests testUimaSentenceIterator - org.apache.uima.resource.ResourceInitializationException for "multidir" resources 2.reproducibleResults_ForMultipleRuns() - produces different results for similar runs during test set running, works fine for isolated run. Looks like Linux only. Caused by parallel iterator and will be investigated as standalone issue. 3.testWord2VecCBOW() - JVM crash on Windows when complete test setup runs. 4.TsneTest.testSimple() - JVM crash 5.BagOfWordsVectorizerTest.testBagOfWordsVectorizer() - assert failed 6. Word2VecTestsSmall.testUnkSerialization_1() - NPE

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
